items.content_html: Wisp is a lightweight templating language that outputs a string without requiring a bundler.
items.title: gavinmcfarland/wisp: Wisp is a lightweight templating language that outputs a string without requiring a bundler.

items.content_html: A lightweight, simple queue system designed for small tasks that need to be executed in a queued manner. This system is not a full-fledged message queue like BullMQ, RabbitMQ, or similar systems, but it offers an efficient solution for handling tasks with minimal setup. It's ideal for projects where simplicity and low overhead are preferred.
items.title: DharamSavsani/MQ-flow: A lightweight, simple queue system designed for small tasks that need to be executed in a queued manner. This system is not a full-fledged message queue like BullMQ, RabbitMQ, or similar systems, but it offers an efficient solution for handling tasks with minimal setup. It's ideal for projects where simplicity and low overhead are preferred.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
